  • 类
    类
    说明
    AdministratorAppointmentManager
    Manages appointments for administrators within the Health Management System.
    Appointment
    This class contains all the details of an appointment
    AppointmentScheduler
    Manages the scheduling of appointments in the healthcare management system.
    DoctorSchedule
    The DoctorSchedule class is responsible for managing a doctor's schedule for a given date, including working hours and breaks.
    DoctorScheduleManager
    Manages the scheduling of appointments for a doctor.
    DoctorSchedules
    Represents the doctor's schedules, including the management of available slots.
    PatientScheduleManager
    Manages the appointment scheduling for a particular patient.
